cgcloud__Job_Definition_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Job_Definition_Template__c
cgcloud__Job_Definition_Template__c.description: Stores the definition of the questions or product surveys that are available in the system.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Specifies whether the template is active.

cgcloud__Consider_Max_Value__c.description: Controls whether the maximum value of the current job definition template is to be considered.

cgcloud__Consider_Min_Value__c.description: Controls whether the minimum value of the current job definition template is to be considered.

cgcloud__Data_Type__c.description: Reference to the data type that's used as an answer in the respective job.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Max_Date_Policy__c.description: Controls the validation of date fields when answering questions or surveys on CAS OnPremise mobile devices.

cgcloud__Max_Value__c.description: Maximum value for the answer of the current job definition template.

cgcloud__Measure_Type__c.description: Measure Type of the referenced Job Definition Template.

cgcloud__Min_Date_Policy__c.description: Controls the validation of date fields when answering questions or surveys on CGCloud OnPremise mobile devices.

cgcloud__Min_Value__c.description: Minimum value for the answer of the current job definition template.

cgcloud__Perfect_Store_Question__c.description: Defines whether a question is to be considered relevant to determine the perfect store index of a call.

cgcloud__Picture_Taking__c.description: Specifies whether a picture can be taken for this question during call execution on mobility devices. Note: This is relevant only for Question.

cgcloud__Presetting__c.description: Specifies the prepopulation of the corresponding attribute in the activity job defintion template (Job_DL_Job_Definition_Template) that's used to control the activity specific to the presetting of the answer in the call.

cgcloud__Primary_Survey_Policy__c.description: Allows specification of three primary product survey questions that's used for discrepancy survey in a matrix-type display on the CAS OnPremise mobility devices.

cgcloud__Competitor_Relevant__c.description: Response to collate competitor information related to (placement or price) of products or promotions.

cgcloud__Product_Reference__c.description: Controls whether the survey is about products. If there's no product reference, then dynamic is true. The string (length 1) options are 0 and 1.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales org to which the job definition template belongs.

cgcloud__Save_Presetting__c.description: Controls whether preset answers are to be automatically stored when completing the call. Note regarding restrictions of save presetting: In the back end, the save presetting is currently restricted to the Last Value presetting in questions and surveys. On mobility devices, the save presetting is currently restricted to surveys only (considering the Last Value and Target Value presetting).

cgcloud__Short_Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Used for sorting. For example, when manually adding questions during call execution on the CAS OnPremise mobile solution.

cgcloud__Step_Size__c.description: Controls the stepper for numeric fields when answering questions or surveys on CAS OnPremise mobile devices.

cgcloud__Survey_Identification__c.description: Used by mobility to store survey identification values.

cgcloud__Target_Value_Column__c.description: Represents the target value column of primary surveys (configured via Primary_Survey_Policy).

cgcloud__Use_Stepper__c.description: Defines whether the stepper is used.
